data.text:
@angelos_frank @AlastairGrant4 Frank, you wouldn't know what an independent variable was if it came up and bit you in the ass. All you can do is parrot crap you read somewhere.

For the sake of your sanity get rid of the tinfoil hat and get some help.

@AlastairGrant4 @timspector @peteinsilico I will roast this charlatan, he would NEVER take me on..
@98Jabjab2
@ianwilson48 @AlastairGrant4 @chrischirp Good question. Iâ€™m sure someone out there will tell us

@supergran520 @ianwilson48 @AlastairGrant4 @chrischirp Not exactly. BA.2 is likely an earlier escape from the same infected individual. It's quite different from BA.1 (at least as many mutations as between Wuhan and Delta, say). Many have actually recommended BA.2 have its own designation.
https://t.co/z91nBQOYE8
@angelos_frank @AlastairGrant4 they will keep at it until they are gone for good
@AlastairGrant4 @KathySm59005579 they are STILL at it? what are we going to do? seriously?

@AlastairGrant4 @timspector where is your independent variable, Grant? without an independent variable, you CANNOT prove a virus exists or is a pathogen...can you show me those studies?? hahahahahahahahah
@peteinsilico ANOTHER charlatan I will ROAST

@AlastairGrant4 No you don't care to debate me on this, sir? yes or no?
How about you stop spreading fear and panic..NOT VIRUS WAS EVER FOUND...show me your independent variable while you're at it, OK? https://t.co/OKmh7cXP5z
